subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Zinédine Zidane, ejected from the World Cup final minutes from the end of overtime, apologized for the incident Wednesday night, but he blamed the Italian defender Marco Materazzi for provoking him.
snippet: Zinédine Zidane, ejected from the World Cup final minutes from the end of overtime, apologized for the incident Wednesday night, but he blamed the Italian defender Marco Materazzi for provoking him.
